briefTitle: Aflibercept in Combination With Docetaxel in Metastatic Androgen Independent Prostate Cancer
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double Blind Study Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of Aflibercept Versus Placebo Administered Every 3 Weeks in Patients Treated With Docetaxel/ Prednisone for Metastatic Androgen-independent Prostate Cancer

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From randomization up to the cut-off date (median follow-up of 35.4 months)
